short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple WHOIS tool. click Quickly check domains to verify who owns them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Domain WHOIS is a small tool to check domains to verify who owns them directly and fast without captcha.
With a just small click and without leave your current page.
Our tool perform WHOIS lookups directly from the extension bar (right to address bar) on any website's domain that you are currently surfing without  wasting time.
